name: places/ChIJZ5JYNr1YwokRfL4Gg806aQs
formattedAddress: 1150 Park Ave, New York, NY 10128, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1150 Park Ave, New York, NY 10128, USA

originalText.text: Dr Weinstein was very sensitive to my needs & my nerves. After a terrible fall on my knee I was unable to walk & in constant unbearable pain.  It has been two weeks since the surgery  & I can walk without a cane & am pain free. I now feel calm $ relaxed. I know I’m in good hands.  Right after surgery I was feeling well & slightly sore. Two days later I was practically pain free and able to take a short walk. The third day I walked the stairs.  I really had nothing to worry about.  I feel like l got my life back. The doctor’s staff was efficient & kind.  Thank you so much Dr Weinstein for soothing my nerves, fixing my knee & giving me my life back.

originalText.text: Dr Weinstein is caring and attentive. He also has a wonderful staff. I was terrified when I started feel severe back pain after my first pregnancy. He took the time to listen and made me feel extremely comfortable and set up a game plan for my care. Couldn't of asked for a better experience. His skill is unquestionable

He took the time to listen and made me feel extremely comfortable and set up a game plan for my care. Couldn't of asked for a better experience. His skill is unquestionable

originalText.text: Dr. Joseph Weinstein , Aida, and all of the office staff have been wonderful throughout the entire surgery. Everything was explained out throughly and if you have any questions, you can even call or tex  and Dr. Weinstein gets back to you right away. I was very nervous about getting spinal procedure on my neck but I had tried everything prior to surgery and knew this was the right choice for me. I would not hesitate a moment for anyone to come here and get an opinion from Dr. Weinstein . He is very kind, knowledgeable and honest! I am on the road to a great recovery and can walk without anymore excruciating  pain on my neck thanks to Dr. Weinstein and his amazing staff!"

originalText.text: Dr Weinstein is one of the best doctors I've ever seen.   His office is well managed and appointments always run on time.   He's personable and has great bedside manner.  I'd recommended him to everyone.  5 stars from me!

text.text: Dr Weinstein is one of the best doctors I've ever seen.   His office is well managed and appointments always run on time.   He's personable and has great bedside manner.  I'd recommended him to everyone.  5 stars from me!

originalText.text: Horrible experience!!!  I've been to Dr Weinstein office 3 times.  He was unprofessional and rude by walking out from the examining room on the 1st visit!  The doctor Weinstein walked out from the room without explaining anything and ordering the x-rays on me.  I was upset for the way I was treated.  So I asked why I was taken to the X-Ray room without explaining me anything first when I already had the x-rays done from a hospital.  Every time I see the Dr, he doesn't explain in detail and I am always rushed out from the office.  I tried to cancel my last appointment since I didn't get the epidural injection before even considering for the surgery.  The receptionist told me to keep the appointment so that the doctor would go over the result of MRI.  So I did.  The doctor didn't discuss anything about the result of MRI but talked about performing the surgery of knee.  Since he rushed me out of the room, I left the office without realizing that he didn't go over the MRI result!  So I went back to the office and asked if I can see the doctor so he can explain about MRI result.  The receptionist talked to the doctor and she told me that I can either re-schedule for another day to see him or wait until he sees ALL other patients already waiting when I was already there earlier!!!  Unbelievable!!!  It's ok to make me wait 45 minutes to an hour to see him, he can't make a time to discuss for 3 minutes?  Obviously, this doctor only cares about making money!  That was the reason for refusing to see me right away so that he can get paid for another unnecessary follow-up consultation!  If he really cared about his patients, he could have made a little time to see me for just few minutes (since he never saw me for more than 3 minutes anyway!).  So I don't recommend this doctor!  He is unprofessional, rude, and the most uncaring doctor I've ever had in my life!  His bedside manner is just horrible!
